thread.title: SECC wins two major event industry awards
thread.title_full: SECC wins two major event industry awards

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: SECC wins two major event industry awards
text:
SECC wins two major event industry awards SECC wins two major event industry awards Details Category: Glasgow   16:15 Multi award winning venue, the Scottish Exhibition and Conference Centre (SECC), has added to its already impressive list of awards as it picked up two more trophies at the prestigious Event Awards in London this week (Wednesday). The ceremony, held at London’s Eventim Apollo in front of an audience of over 700 leading figures from the UK event industry, saw the SECC walk away with the awards for Event Space of the Year and Venue Team of the Year, the second year running it has triumphed in this category. 
Commenting on the wins, Kathleen Warden, Director of Conference Sales at the SECC said: “This was a great night for the SECC and for Glasgow, and is testament to the dedication, commitment and passion of the entire team across the campus. These awards demonstrate that the SECC is providing a world class team and a world class venue for diverse and demanding events. The awards also follow on from one of the most successful years in SECC’s history, where it was the venue for a number of major events including the 2014 Commonwealth Games and the MTV Europe Awards, and over 50 conferences.
